items.question: Was the erotic painting that replaces "Boy with Apple" painted just for the movie?
items.answer: Yes, it was. Director Wes Anderson ordered an Egon Schiele-style painting that needed to feature "Two Lesbians Masturbating". Artist Rich Pellegrino created seven versions and Anderson chose one.

items.question: Who is giant prisoner with scar on his face???
items.answer: The name of the actor is Frank Jacob (http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3907145). He is credited as the "Giant Convict"

spoilerItems.question: How did Mr. Gustave die? It's indicated that he never grow old, but how does he die?
spoilerItems.answer: Zero says he was gunned down, most likely after he rebelled against the guards in the train scene at the end of the film.
